content.description: An amusement park attraction has a sign that indicates that a person must be at least 48 inches tall to ride the attraction. The following boxplot shows the heights of a sample of people who entered the amusement park on one day.
content.question: Based on the boxplot, approximately what percent of the people who entered the amusement park met the height requirement for the attraction?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
